content: baby dress this dress was created using scraps left over from another baby project therefore i cannot be precise about the amount of yarn needed size newborn to one month materials lion brand pound of love® color #101 pastel pink approximately 3 oz bernat® satin color #04423 flamingo approximately one-half oz crochet hooks sizes k and n if you crochet loosely you will want to use smaller sizes such as h and j one yard of yellow satin ribbon one-half inch wide two small buttons yarn needle small amount of sewing thread gauge 3 double_crochet = one inch 2 row = one inch abbreviations chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch st = stitch single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet round = round beg = beginning space = space yo = yarn over decrease = decrease single_crochet decrease draw up a loop in st draw up a loop in next st work loops off hook 1 stitch decreased special stitches shell work 5 double_crochet in same st or space picot single_crochet chain 3 slip_stitch in first chain single_crochet in same space note chain-3 counts as first st of next row or round instructions with smaller hook and pastel pink yarn chain 42 row 1 double_crochet in fourth chain from hook 4 double_crochet double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in next chain 5 double_crochet double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in next chain 16 double_crochet double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in next chain 5 double_crochet double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in next chain 5 double_crochet chain 3 turn 44 sts row 2 5 double_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in next chain-2 space 7 double_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in next chain-2 space 18 double_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in next chain-2 space 7 double_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in next chain-2 space 6 double_crochet chain 3 turn 60 sts row 3 7 double_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in next chain-2 space 11 double_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 2 1 double_crochet in next chain-2 space 22 double_crochet 1 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in next chain-2 space 11 double_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in next chain-2 space 8 double_crochet chain 3 turn 74 sts row 4 9 double_crochet 1 double_crochet chain 2 1 double_crochet in next chain-2 space 15 double_crochet 1 double_crochet chain 2 1 double_crochet in next chain-2 space 24 double_crochet 1 double_crochet chain 2 1 double_crochet in next chain-2 space 15 double_crochet 1 double_crochet chain 2 1 double_crochet in next chain-2 space 10 double_crochet chain 3 turn 82 sts join bodice double_crochet in each double_crochet to first chain-2 space * work double_crochet in space chain 3 skip sleeve sts double_crochet in next chain-2 space* double_crochet in each double_crochet to next chain-2 space repeat from * to * once double_crochet in each remaining double_crochet end with slip_stitch in top of beg chain-3 from this point on do not turn work skirt round 1 chain 3 skip 1 st shell skip 1 st * double_crochet skip 1 st
